TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ComVisibleAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ComVisibleAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ComVisibleAttribute sealed : Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Enum | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Interface | System.AttributeTargets.Delegate, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 控制公開至 COM 之個別 Managed 類型或成員，或組件內所有類型的存取範圍。

span.span: Controls accessibility of an individual managed type or member, or of all types within an assembly, to COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將此屬性套用至組件、 介面、 類別、 結構、 委派、 列舉型別、 欄位、 方法或屬性。You can apply this attribute to assemblies, interfaces, classes, structures, delegates, enumerations, fields, methods, or properties. 預設值是`true`，這表示 managed 型別為為 COM 可見。The default is `true`, which indicates that the managed type is visible to COM. 若要顯示公用的 managed 組件和類型; 不需要這個屬性它們是依預設為 COM 可見。This attribute is not needed to make public managed assemblies and types visible; they are visible to COM by default. 只有`public`類型可變成可見。Only `public` types can be made visible. 屬性不能讓其他`internal`或`protected`對 COM 或顯示看不見的型別成員的可見的類型。The attribute cannot be used to make an otherwise `internal` or `protected` type visible to COM or to make members of a nonvisible type visible. 將屬性設定為`false`組件上隱藏所有`public`組件中的類型。Setting the attribute to `false` on the assembly hides all `public` types within the assembly. 您可以選擇性地讓類型在組件內顯示個別的型別設定為`true`。You can selectively make types within the assembly visible by setting the individual types to `true`. 將屬性設定為`false`對特定類型會隱藏該類型及其成員。Setting the attribute to `false` on a specific type hides that type and its members. 不過，您無法讓類型的成員顯示如果類型是不可見。However, you cannot make members of a type visible if the type is invisible. 將屬性設定為`false`上型別可防止該型別匯出至類型程式庫; 類別尚未登錄介面都會永遠不會回應至 unmanaged`QueryInterface`呼叫。Setting the attribute to `false` on a type prevents that type from being exported to a type library; classes are not registered; interfaces are never responsive to unmanaged `QueryInterface` calls. 除非您明確設定的類別和其成員以`false`、 繼承的類別可以公開給 COM 在原始的類別中不可見的基底類別成員。Unless you explicitly set a class and its members to `false`, inherited classes can expose to COM base class members that are invisible in the original class. 例如，如果您設定呼叫 ClassA`false`和其成員，不套用屬性、 類別和其成員會看不到 com。For example, if you set ClassA to `false` and do not apply the attribute to its members, the class and its members are invisible to COM. 不過，如果您從呼叫 ClassA 衍生 ClassB，匯出至 COM 的呼叫 ClassB ClassA 成員會變成 ClassB 可見的基底類別成員。However, if you derive ClassB from ClassA and export ClassB to COM, ClassA members become visible base class members of ClassB. 匯出程序的詳細說明，請參閱[組件至類型程式庫轉換的摘要](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3a37eefb-a76c-4000-9080-7dbbf66a4896)。For a detailed description of the export process, see [Assembly to Type Library Conversion Summary](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3a37eefb-a76c-4000-9080-7dbbf66a4896). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何控制類別的 com 的可見性，使其成員都是不可見。The following example shows how you can control the visibility to COM of a class so that its members are invisible. 藉由設定`ComVisibleAttribute`至`false`上`MyClass`(`SampleClass`在 Visual Basic 範例)，和`false`上`MyMethod`和`MyProperty`，您可以避免不小心公開給 COM 透過繼承的成員。By setting `ComVisibleAttribute` to `false` on `MyClass`(`SampleClass` in the Visual Basic example), and `false` on `MyMethod` and `MyProperty`, you can avoid inadvertently exposing the members to COM through inheritance. [!code-cpp[Classic ComVisibleAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ComVisibleAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ComVisibleAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ComVisibleAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ComVisibleAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ComVisibleAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要讓類型為 COM 可見，請將屬性設定為`true`。To make types visible to COM, set the attribute to `true`. 若要隱藏從 COM 類型，將屬性設定為`false`。To hide types from COM, set the attribute to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As Boolean
public: property bool Value { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示 COM 型別是否為可見。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the COM type is visible.

value.span: 若為可見的型別，為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the type is visible; otherwise, .
